info.name: Hide Google Search Promotion Prompt
info.description:
Few weeks ago, Promotion prompt was shown on Google Search. This style sheet will hide such promotion prompt "Come here often? Make Google your homepage".

Known Issues
2017/09/21 - Blocking logout pane - under investigation - maybe solved
2017/10/20 - Blocking logout pane again due to internal design was changed - under investigation - fixed
2017/10/28 - Broken again due to internal design was changed - fixing now - fixed

Trouble shooting:
If something wrong was happen, try clear file cache first.
